section.title: Random Add Processor
section.para: The RandomAddProcessor takes a pfield to apply the random add to, as well as a min and max for the boundaries of the random values. When applied, it will add a random value to each note in the assigned pfield, using a new random value per note.
The RandomAddProcessor expects either a positive or negative float value for the min an max, and a postive integer for the pfield. The following score:
